name: HOP! (IsNotAduck)
description:
made for the fifth NOKIA 3310 jam

Select 3 enemies to jump on and hit as many as you can along the way, you'll need a moment to rest before jumping again, so be careful where you position yourself. Difficulty increases as you play, the goal of the game is to survive as long as possible 

web version has some issues and may not work for everyone, would heavily recommend downloading the game, if you can be bothered

CONTROLS:
numpad 1-9 - target enemies (alternative controls are available but u should use the numpad)

0 - unselect the last target

enter - attack targeted enemies
